reviewText:
Tim Conway, Carol Burnett and Harvey Korman in 2002 discuss both episodes before and after.
 The Carol Burnett Show (CBS): Season 10, episode 23. Broadcast: March 26, 1977.
Carol Burnett, Harvey Korman, Vicki Lawrence, Tim Conway. Guest: Ken Berry.
Mr. Tudball and Mrs. Wiggins try a new Fire Safety Program. Ken Berry tap-dances in "I Got Rhythm". Tim Conway & Harvey Korman in "Lost in the Sahara". Salute to MGM Musicals.

Season 7, episode 20. Broadcast: February 16, 1974.
Carol Burnett, Harvey Korman, Vicki Lawrence. Guests: Bernadette Peters, Tim Conway.
As the Stomach Turns does their take on The Exorcist (1973). Bernadette Peters sings. Two female chums meet again. Tim Conway and Harvey Korman as Japanese sailors. Gang movies sketch. Tribute to Harry Warren musical.

English language only. Subtitles in Spanish available.
Its ok wasn't what I thought I ordered, I love Carol Burnett,  it was fun to watch but I waw expecting a different version to what I wanted. Thanks
